title: Peacock Schedule December 30 2024 – January 5 2025: New TV Shows & Movies Being Added
description: Peacock’s new TV and movie releases for December 30, 2024 – January 5, 2025, include Jesus Revolution and Killer Relationship with Faith Jenkins Season 3. December 31 sees the release of the film Jesus Revolution on Peacock. This film is directed by Jon Irwin and Brent McCorkle from a script penned by Erwin and Jon […] The post Peacock Schedule December 30 2024 – January 5 2025: New TV Shows & Movies Being Added appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Abdul Azim Naushad
excerpt: Subscribers curious about Peacock's release schedule for December 30 2024-January 5 2025 can find out more from this story.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Peacock’s new TV and movie releases for December 30, 2024 – January 5, 2025, include Jesus Revolution and Killer Relationship with Faith Jenkins Season 3. December 31 sees the release of the film Jesus Revolution on Peacock. This film is directed by Jon Irwin and Brent McCorkle from a script penned by Erwin and Jon Gunn. The story, set in the 1970s, follows Greg Laurie, a teenager who has no life goals. His life dramatically changes when he meets a street preacher and hippie named Lonnie Frisbee. Teaming up with pastor Chuck Smith, the trio attempt to revive a failing church. Joel Courtney, Kelsey Grammer, and Jonathan Roumie headline the film. Supporting cast members include Kimberly Williams-Paisley, Anna Grace Barlow, Julia Campbell, Alexia Ioannides, and Matthew Montemaro. Also coming out on Peacock on the 31st is Killer Relationship with Faith Jenkins Season 3. This crime documentary series follows the title character, who investigates romantic relationships that started out pleasant and intimate but ended in a gruesome manner. Also dropping this week is the finale of Snapped Season 34. Snapped is a crime documentary series that was created by Deborah Allen, Todd Moss, Geoffrey Proud, Stephen Land, and Zak Weisfeld. The documentary primarily revolves around women, typically mothers, wives, and girlfriends, who are often at the center of murder cases. Sharon Martin, Jody Flader, Laura San Giacomo and Ronnie Farer have served as narrators of the documentary’s episodes. New Peacock releases for December 30, 2024 – January ,5 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Peacock from December 30, 2024 – January 5, 2025. December 30 Inside Look: Nosferatu December 31 Jesus Revolution Killer Relationship with Faith Jenkins, Season 3 (Oxygen) Snapped, Season 34 – Finale (Oxygen) Stillwater NOTE: January 1-5 2025’s schedule is currently unavailable. This weekly schedule story will be updated when the official release schedule for it arrives. For more Peacock content, learn if Laid Season 2 has been canceled or renewed. Also, Eddie Redmayne is expected to return for The Day of the Jackal’s second season.
html:
Peacock’s new TV and movie releases for December 30, 2024 – January 5, 2025, include Jesus Revolution and Killer Relationship with Faith Jenkins Season 3.

December 31 sees the release of the film Jesus Revolution on Peacock. This film is directed by Jon Irwin and Brent McCorkle from a script penned by Erwin and Jon Gunn. The story, set in the 1970s, follows Greg Laurie, a teenager who has no life goals. His life dramatically changes when he meets a street preacher and hippie named Lonnie Frisbee. Teaming up with pastor Chuck Smith, the trio attempt to revive a failing church.

Joel Courtney, Kelsey Grammer, and Jonathan Roumie headline the film. Supporting cast members include Kimberly Williams-Paisley, Anna Grace Barlow, Julia Campbell, Alexia Ioannides, and Matthew Montemaro.

Also coming out on Peacock on the 31st is Killer Relationship with Faith Jenkins Season 3. This crime documentary series follows the title character, who investigates romantic relationships that started out pleasant and intimate but ended in a gruesome manner.

Also dropping this week is the finale of Snapped Season 34.

Snapped is a crime documentary series that was created by Deborah Allen, Todd Moss, Geoffrey Proud, Stephen Land, and Zak Weisfeld. The documentary primarily revolves around women, typically mothers, wives, and girlfriends, who are often at the center of murder cases. Sharon Martin, Jody Flader, Laura San Giacomo and Ronnie Farer have served as narrators of the documentary’s episodes.

New Peacock releases for December 30, 2024 – January ,5 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Peacock from December 30, 2024 – January 5, 2025.

December 30

  • Inside Look: Nosferatu

December 31

  • Jesus Revolution
  • Killer Relationship with Faith Jenkins, Season 3 (Oxygen)
  • Snapped, Season 34 – Finale (Oxygen)
  • Stillwater

NOTE: January 1-5 2025’s schedule is currently unavailable. This weekly schedule story will be updated when the official release schedule for it arrives.

For more Peacock content, learn if Laid Season 2 has been canceled or renewed. Also, Eddie Redmayne is expected to return for The Day of the Jackal’s second season.
